Do I really need this item?
How would this item improve my day-to-day life?
Why am I really buying this item? Is it because of my peers? Is it because of an ad? Is it because of my own understanding of my needs?
Make a shopping list BEFORE going to the store?
Question: Is this item stockable? Is this item perishable? Do I really need 5 items? Do I have space to store these items?
Will these items fit in my shopping bag or carry on?
